articles.title: Police volunteer in India convicted in rape and murder of doctor that sparked widespread protests - CBS News
articles.description: Protests erupted in West Bengal last August after the body of a trainee doctor was found with multiple injuries in a hospital lecture hall.
articles.content:
A police volunteer was found guilty of the rape and murder of a trainee doctor in India, a crime that sparked countrywide protests and hospital strikes last year.
Judge Anirban Das said the sentence… [+3147 chars]

articles.author: TOI Lifestyle Desk
articles.title: ​Cancer cases surge in young; simple lifestyle changes to lower your risk - The Times of India
articles.description: The rising trend of early-onset cancers in adults under 50, particularly women, is alarming. Genetic, lifestyle, and environmental factors contribute
